author: Katherine Doherty
title: Distressed Debt Balloons to Almost $1 Trillion, Nears 2008 Peak
description: The amount of distressed debt in the U.S. has quadrupled in less than a week to nearly $1 trillion, reaching levels not seen since 2008 as the collapse of oil prices and fallout from the coronavirus shutters entire industries across the globe.
